list.abs: 老年人便秘(senile constipation)是指排便次数减少，同时排便困难，粪便干结。正常人每天排便1～2次，或2～3天排便1次，便秘患者 …

entry.def: If old people become senile, they become confused, can no longer remember things, and are unable to look after themselves.
